thread.section_title: ShoeDazzle Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ShoeDazzle | www.shoedazzle.com | 5 of 122
thread.title: Sara

author: Sara
title: Sara
text: I wish i was better able to chat with someone online rather than making a call. They are also a bit sneaky with their sales. Some sales do not apply if you haven't already purchased something full priced prior with is messed up. It is misleading people into believing that they are getting a good deal when it ends up being the same thing. The shoes i have ordered have been fabulous and wonderful. I have ordered a cardigan and the fit was too big so I returned it. Only the false advertising is what I have to complain about.
